name: ext_R5_ServiceRequest_orderDetail
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.orderDetail for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.orderDetail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Additional details and instructions about the how the services are to be delivered.   For example, and order for a urinary catheter may have an order detail for an external or indwelling catheter, or an order for a bandage may require additional instructions specifying how the bandage should be applied.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

element.short: The detail of the order being requested
